history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or walking directions
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER UPMC Presby
TTS Okay, going to upmc presbyterian. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER 2 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the default Google directions, to hear a route in <break time='200ms'/> mobility mode, please say ALTERNATE ROUTE. <break time='500ms'/>The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 13 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 3 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at Craig Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61B <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue + Atwood Street</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 2:09pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 4 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 200 Lothrop Street </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER alternate route

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> You are now hearing the mobility wheelchair mode. <break time='500ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 13 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Start at Carnegie Mellon University. Go west on FORBES AVENUE toward SOUTH CRAIG STREET, and then cross the street on <break strength='strong'/>SOUTH CRAIG STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on SOUTH CRAIG STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on FORBES AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Finish at Forbes Ave at Craig Streeton the right </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61B <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue + Atwood Street</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 2:09pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Start at Fifth Ave + Atwood Street Go southwest on 5TH AVENUE toward MEYRAN AVENUE, and then cross the street on <break strength='strong'/>MEYRAN AVENUE </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on LOTHROP STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue on LOTHROP. and then cross the street on <break strength='strong'/>VICTORIA.</speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right on VICTORIA. and then cross the street on <break strength='strong'/>LOTHROP STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Finish at UPMC Presbyterian on the right </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
